title: Changes to Config.php Commit 4bdb66759c24c41fefec7952b12a0595a671eaa2
body:
The changes to commit 4bdb66759c24c41fefec7952b12a0595a671eaa2 (Config.php) cause problems with Apache VirtualHost.

Pre changes worked fine.

The Apache httpd.conf contains
VirtualDocumentRoot /Volumes/htdocs/%-3/app/public/

Array
(
    [REDIRECT_CI_ENV] => sandbox
    [REDIRECT_CI_DEBUG] => development
    [REDIRECT_LOG_THRESHOLD] => 255
    [REDIRECT_STATUS] => 200
    [CI_ENV] => sandbox
    [CI_DEBUG] => development
    [LOG_THRESHOLD] => 255
    [HTTP_HOST] => heat.vcap.me
    [HTTP_CONNECTION] => keep-alive
    [HTTP_PRAGMA] => no-cache
    [HTTP_CACHE_CONTROL] => no-cache
    [HTTP_ACCEPT] => text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,_/_;q=0.8
    [HTTP_USER_AGENT] => Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_9_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/37.0.2062.124 Safari/537.36
    [HTTP_DNT] => 1
    [HTTP_REFERER] => http://heat.vcap.me/auth
    [HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING] => gzip,deflate,sdch
    [HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE] => en-US,en;q=0.8
    [HTTP_COOKIE] => spl_session=afc4ce0330734510873cb61412d790d462ffcc8404f5324959c2758994ccfb89001e2f1405aa115e2c1eac6c44214a131d336737c0ddd06c2419a90dd62e8c3d
    [PATH] => /usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin
    [SERVER_SIGNATURE] => 
    [SERVER_SOFTWARE] => Apache/2.2.26 (Unix) mod_fastcgi/2.4.6 mod_wsgi/3.4 Python/2.7.6 PHP/5.5.10 mod_ssl/2.2.26 OpenSSL/0.9.8za DAV/2 mod_perl/2.0.8 Perl/v5.18.2
    [SERVER_NAME] => heat.vcap.me
    [SERVER_ADDR] => 127.0.0.1
    [SERVER_PORT] => 80
    [REMOTE_ADDR] => 127.0.0.1
    [DOCUMENT_ROOT] => /Volumes/htdocs
    [SERVER_ADMIN] => you@example.com
    [SCRIPT_FILENAME] => /Volumes/htdocs/heat/app/public/index.php
    [REMOTE_PORT] => 60226
    [REDIRECT_URL] => /redirect/admin-home
    [GATEWAY_INTERFACE] => CGI/1.1
    [SERVER_PROTOCOL] => HTTP/1.1
    [REQUEST_METHOD] => GET
    [QUERY_STRING] => 
    [REQUEST_URI] => /redirect/admin-home
    [SCRIPT_NAME] => /index.php
    [PATH_INFO] => /redirect/admin-home
    [PATH_TRANSLATED] => redirect:/index.php/redirect/admin-home/admin-home
    [PHP_SELF] => /index.php/redirect/admin-home
    [REQUEST_TIME_FLOAT] => 1412801353.74
    [REQUEST_TIME] => 1412801353
    [argv] => Array
        (
        )

```
[argc] => 0
```

)
